12, (1) The Board shall cause proper books of accounts Account
to be kept of the income and expenditure, assets and
abilities and all other transactions af: the Foundation,
(2) The Board shall cause {ts books to be balanced as oa

(8) The income and expenditure account and the balance

by such other officers of the Foundation as may be autho-
tized by the Board to do so.
(4) The accounts of the Foundation shall be audited by
@ qualified auditor,
(5) The Board shall annually prepare a report of the
work of the Foundation and a report of the finances during
the year completed, which abull together with the report of
the qualified auditor, be tabled in Parliament and be pub-
lished in the Gazette for general information before the
lapse of the year succeeding the year to which such report
of the finances relate,
